info.description:
This style sets the vid to the max width leaving all other stuff in it's place :).
Use the show/hide button to match 2nd columns height.
Please optimize the height to your screen (I CAN HAS BIG SCREEN?).

Big preview: http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/7668/yt3vs2.png

Enjoy :).
